title: Enduring Fate
description: Book One in the Fate for Love SeriesColton Kingston has loved Paige Summers his entire life. All he has ever dreamed of is having Paige by his side while he lives the simple life of a cowboy raising horses and cattle on his farm.When tragedy strikes, fate tests the strength of their love.Paige's confidence is shaken as she wonders if she can heal from her past and move forward, so Colton can have the life he was born to live.Can Colton and Paige endure everything in fate's path? Or will Paige give up her one true love to give Colton the life he deserves?    The Fate for Love Series is complete and available now!Suggested Reading FateBoundless FateEndless Fate(The Beautiful Series characters are secondary characters in these novels.)Connect with Alicia Text RAE to 22828 to join my email list for the most up to date release information. ~ facebook.com/aliciaraeauthor~ @AliciaRaeAuthor     *Book Contains Mature Content* Enduring Fate is an erotic western romance series with the perfect blend of passion, romantic suspense, and adventure.
author: Alicia Rae
